title: dd element
description: Description list - description element. See [the `dl` element](/tech/html/dl_element) for more information.

references.title: W3C HTML5 spec for the dd element
WHATWG HTML5 spec for the dd element

assertions.title: The screen reader MUST convey the description role
assertions.rationale: A user needs to be able to distinguish between a description term and its description.

assertions.title: The screen reader MUST convey the position of either 1. the group of term/description pairs OR 2. the description in the list
assertions.rationale: A user needs to be able to understand the location of the group in the overall list.
